scripts.deploy-stack: npm run build && serverless deploy --alias dev
scripts.deploy-stack:dev: npm run build && serverless deploy --alias dev
scripts.deploy-stack:staging: npm run build && serverless deploy --alias staging
scripts.deploy-stack:prod: npm run build && serverless deploy --alias prod
scripts.deploy-function: npm run build && serverless deploy function --alias dev --force
scripts.deploy-function:dev: npm run build && serverless deploy function --alias dev --force
scripts.deploy-function:staging: npm run build && serverless deploy function --alias staging --force
scripts.deploy-function:prod: npm run build && serverless deploy function --alias prod --force
